description:
The Empire Strikes Back


After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly
established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda,
while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

"Despecialized Editions" are high definition reconstructions of the theatrical 
versions of the STAR WARS films. The original shots are painstakingly restored 
using various sources ranging from VHS, LaserDisc, DVD, BluRay to 35mm print scans. 
 A gallery of all the changes can be found here:
 <a href=" https://plus.google.com/u/1/photos/109609428403596349302/albums/6044645069501365185" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> https://plus.google.com/u/1/photos/109609428403596349302/albums/6044645069501365185</a>

The main goal is to get as close as possible to the original versions of the films as seen in cinemas
on opening day, while maintaining high picture and audio quality.
